question: I have never been diagnosed with any diabetes, Although my Grandmother & Mother were diabetics.I have lately been experiencing severe swelling and pains in my legs, my right side more than the left. I discovered the other day (Saturday night) a large what appeared to be a blood clot on my right breast.  I went to the ER in November with the same complaint, only I didn't have the blood clot. What could this be?
title: leg swelling & pain
